trans-unit.source: The type of the result value assocatied with this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de valor do resultado associado a este <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Represents the producer side of a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> unbound to a delegate, providing access to the consumer side through the <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o lado do produtor de um <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> não associado a um delegado, fornecendo acesso ao lado do consumidor por meio da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" />.

trans-unit.source: In many scenarios, it is useful to enable a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> to represent an external asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Em muitos cenários, é útil habilitar um <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> representar uma operação assíncrona externa.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601> is provided for this purpose.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601> é fornecido para essa finalidade.

trans-unit.source: It enables the creation of a task that can be handed out to consumers, and those consumers can use the members of the task as they would any other.
trans-unit.target: Ele permite a criação de uma tarefa que pode ser enviada para os consumidores, e esses clientes podem usar os membros da tarefa como qualquer outra.

trans-unit.source: However, unlike most tasks, the state of a task created by a TaskCompletionSource is controlled explicitly by the methods on TaskCompletionSource.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, ao contrário da maioria das tarefas, o estado de uma tarefa criada por um TaskCompletionSource é controlado explicitamente pelos métodos em TaskCompletionSource.

trans-unit.source: This enables the completion of the external asynchronous operation to be propagated to the underlying Task.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que a conclusão da operação assíncrona externa para ser propagada para a tarefa subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The separation also ensures that consumers are not able to transition the state without access to the corresponding TaskCompletionSource.
trans-unit.target: A separação também garante que os consumidores não são capazes de transição do estado sem acesso ao TaskCompletionSource correspondente.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the entry [The Nature of TaskCompletionSource\<TResult>](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2009/06/02/9685804.aspx) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a entrada [a natureza de TaskCompletionSource\<TResult >](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2009/06/02/9685804.aspx) em programação paralela com .NET blog.

trans-unit.source: The [Parallel Extensions samples](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=165717) also contain examples of how to use <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601>.
trans-unit.target: O [exemplos de extensões paralelas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=165717) também contêm exemplos de como usar <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601>:
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar um <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601>:

trans-unit.source: All members of <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" /> are thread-safe and may be used from multiple threads concurrently.
trans-unit.target: Todos os membros de <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" /> são thread-safe e podem ser usados em vários threads ao mesmo tempo.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria um objeto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.

trans-unit.source: The state to use as the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />'s AsyncState.
trans-unit.target: O estado a ser usado como o AsyncState subjacente da <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" /> with the specified state.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" /> com o estado especificado.

trans-unit.source: The options to use when creating the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: As opções a serem usadas ao criar o <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" /> with the specified options.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" /> com as opções especificadas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> created by this instance and accessible through its <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601.Task%2A> property will be instantiated using the specified `creationOptions`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> criado por essa instância e acessível por meio de seu <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601.Task%2A> propriedade será instanciada usando especificado `creationOptions`.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="creationOptions" /> represent options invalid for use with a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="creationOptions" /> representa opções inválidas para uso com um <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.

trans-unit.source: The state to use as the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />'s AsyncState.
trans-unit.target: O estado a ser usado como o AsyncState subjacente da <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.

trans-unit.source: The options to use when creating the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: As opções a serem usadas ao criar o <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" /> with the specified state and options.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" /> com o estado e as opções especificados.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="creationOptions" /> represent options invalid for use with a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="creationOptions" /> representa opções inválidas para uso com um <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Transitions the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Faz a transição do <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> subjacente para o estado <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />.

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> is already in one of the three final states: <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" />, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />, or if the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> subjacente já está em um dos três estados finais: <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />, ou se o <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> subjacente já tiver sido descartado.

trans-unit.source: Transitions the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> object into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Faz a transição do objeto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> subjacente para o estado <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of exceptions to bind to this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de exceções para associar a este <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Transitions the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> state and binds a collection of exception objects to it.
trans-unit.target: Faz a transição do <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> subjacente para o estado <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> e associa uma coleção de objetos de exceção a ele.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" /> was disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="exceptions" /> argument is null.
trans-unit.target: O argumento <paramref name="exceptions" /> é nulo.

trans-unit.source: There are one or more null elements in <paramref name="exceptions" />.
trans-unit.target: Há um ou mais elementos nulos em <paramref name="exceptions" />.

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> is already in one of the three final states: <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" />, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> subjacente já está em um dos três estados finais: <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />.

trans-unit.source: The exception to bind to this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: A exceção para associar a este <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Transitions the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> state and binds it to a specified exception.
trans-unit.target: Faz a transição do <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> subjacente para o estado <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> e associa-o a uma exceção especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" /> was disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="exception" /> argument is null.
trans-unit.target: O argumento <paramref name="exception" /> é nulo.

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> is already in one of the three final states: <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" />, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> subjacente já está em um dos três estados finais: <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />.

trans-unit.source: The result value to bind to this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor do resultado a se associar a esse <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Transitions the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Faz a transição do <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> subjacente para o estado <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" /> was disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> is already in one of the three final states: <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" />, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> subjacente já está em um dos três estados finais: <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> created by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> criado por esse <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> created by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> criado por esse <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.

trans-unit.source: This property enables a consumer to access the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> that is controlled by this instance.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade permite que um consumidor acessar o <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> que é controlado por esta instância.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601> object, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A> property of this <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object returns <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.WaitingForActivation>
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601> objeto, o <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A> propriedade deste <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> retorna do objeto <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.WaitingForActivation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601.SetResult%2A>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601.SetException%2A>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601.SetException%2A>, and <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601.SetCanceled%2A> methods (and their "Try" variants) on this instance all result in the relevant state transitions on this underlying Task.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601.SetResult%2A>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601.SetException%2A>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601.SetException%2A>, e <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601.SetCanceled%2A> métodos (e suas variantes de "Try") neste instância todos resultam nas transições de estado relevantes sobre isso subjacente da tarefa.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to transition the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Tenta fazer a transição do <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> subjacente para o estado <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to transition the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Tenta fazer a transição do <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> subjacente para o estado <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />.

trans-unit.source: True if the operation was successful; false if the operation was unsuccessful or the object has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: True se a operação for bem-sucedida; false se a operação for malsucedida ou o objeto já tiver sido descartado.

trans-unit.source: This operation will return false if the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> is already in one of the three final states: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>, or <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>.
trans-unit.target: Essa operação retornará false se o <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> já está em um dos três estados finais: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>, ou <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>.

trans-unit.source: This method also returns false if the underlying <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Esse método também retornará false se subjacente <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: A cancellation token.
trans-unit.target: Um token de cancelamento.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to transition the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" /> state and enables a cancellation token to be stored in the canceled task.
trans-unit.target: Tenta fazer a transição do <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> subjacente para o estado <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" /> e permite que um token de cancelamento seja armazenado na tarefa cancelada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the operation is successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a operação for bem-sucedida; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The method returns false if the underlying <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object is already in one of the following three final states.
trans-unit.target: O método retornará false se subjacente <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> objeto já está em um dos três estados finais.

trans-unit.source: This method also returns `false` if the underlying <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Esse método também retorna `false` se subjacente <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> objeto já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to transition the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> object into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Tenta fazer a transição do objeto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> subjacente para o estado <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of exceptions to bind to this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de exceções para associar a este <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to transition the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> state and binds a collection of exception objects to it.
trans-unit.target: Tenta fazer a transição do <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> subjacente para o estado <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> e associa uma coleção de objetos de exceção a ele.

trans-unit.source: True if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: True se a operação tiver sido bem-sucedida; caso contrário, false.

trans-unit.source: This operation will return false if the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> is already in one of the three final states: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>, or <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>.
trans-unit.target: Essa operação retornará false se o <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> já está em um dos três estados finais: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>, ou <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" /> was disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="exceptions" /> argument is null.
trans-unit.target: O argumento <paramref name="exceptions" /> é nulo.

trans-unit.source: There are one or more null elements in <paramref name="exceptions" />.
trans-unit.target: Há um ou mais elementos nulos em <paramref name="exceptions" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="exceptions" /> collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: A coleção <paramref name="exceptions" /> está vazia.

trans-unit.source: The exception to bind to this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: A exceção para associar a este <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to transition the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> state and binds it to a specified exception.
trans-unit.target: Tenta fazer a transição do <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> subjacente para o estado <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> e o associa a uma exceção especificada.

trans-unit.source: True if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: True se a operação tiver sido bem-sucedida; caso contrário, false.

trans-unit.source: This operation will return false if the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> is already in one of the three final states: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>, or <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>.
trans-unit.target: Essa operação retornará false se o <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> já está em um dos três estados finais: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>, ou <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" /> was disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="exception" /> argument is null.
trans-unit.target: O argumento <paramref name="exception" /> é nulo.

trans-unit.source: The result value to bind to this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor do resultado a se associar a esse <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to transition the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Tenta fazer a transição do <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> subjacente para o estado <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />.

trans-unit.source: True if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: True se a operação tiver sido bem-sucedida; caso contrário, false.

trans-unit.source: This operation will return false if the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> is already in one of the three final states: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>, or <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>.
trans-unit.target: Essa operação retornará false se o <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> já está em um dos três estados finais: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>, ou <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>.

trans-unit.source: This method also returns false if the underlying <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Esse método também retornará false se subjacente <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> já foi descartado.
